DOC.brief_summary: To compare local systemic pharmacokinetics tenofovir reduced-glycerin 1 % gel 2 week daily rectal use 2 week daily vaginal use
DOC.brief_title: Tenofovir Levels Following Local Application Tenofovir Reduced-Glycerin 1 % Gel
